description: 10 interviews with Victorian war veterans, created as part of the "In our words : Stories from Victorian veterans" Digital Storytelling workshop in August 2009, with the support of the Department of Planning and Community Development, the Shrine of Remembrance, and the Victorian Veterans Council.
